definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: As oxygen flooded into Herring's lungs, her color returned.
sentences.chinese: 當氧氣輸入海嶺的肺部時，她的臉色漸趨正常。

sentences.english: There wasn't even time for making a surgical entry into Herring's brain.
sentences.chinese: 甚至來不及在海嶺的腦部做一個進行外科手術的通道。

sentences.english: Even so, Herring still could not recall any details of the accident.
sentences.chinese: 儘管云云，海嶺還是記不起義故的細節。

sentences.english: In the emergency room he immediately noticed Herring's uniform.
sentences.chinese: 在搶捄室，他立即看到了海嶺的制服。

sentences.english: As Herring was wheeled toward the operating room, her blood pressure suddenly rose.
sentences.chinese: 當海嶺被推往手術室的時候，她的血壓突然上升了。
